name: hackatum-2023
description: a demo app for check24 challenge in hackatum-2023

scripts.ensure-dev-database-docker-container-rem: docker ps -q --filter "name=^dev_postgres_container$" && docker stop dev_postgres_container && docker rm dev_postgres_container 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.ensure-dev-database-docker-image-removed: docker images -q dev_postgres && docker rmi dev_postgres 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.start-dev-database: npm run ensure-dev-database-docker-container-removed && npm run ensure-dev-database-docker-image-removed && npm run build-dev-database-docker-image && npm run start-dev-database-docker-container

author: check24
